# supportsDevice(_:)

**Type Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the temporal scaler works with a GPU.

## Declaration

```swift
class func supportsDevice(_ device: any MTLDevice) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **device**: An [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] instance that represents a GPU.

## Checking a GPU device’s scaling support

- **supportedInputContentMinScale(device:)**: Returns the smallest temporal scaling factor the device supports as a floating-point value.
- **supportedInputContentMaxScale(device:)**: Returns the largest temporal scaling factor the device supports as a floating-point value.
